static Logger _logger = LogManager.GetCurrentClassLogger()

Detailed Description

The class that loads, runs and handles events of the Shopped main GUI.

Parameters:
_shoppedGuiHelper An instance of the ShoppedGuiHelper class.
_logger An instance of nLogger, which allows us to write debug statements to file.

Member Function Documentation

void UI::ShoppedGui::aboutToolStripMenuItem_Click ( object  sender,
EventArgs  e 
) [inline, private]

Handles the event of clicking Help->About menu item. Displays message box containing information about Shopped (developer names, program info).

void UI::ShoppedGui::AdjustBrightness (  )  [inline, private]

Pops up a dialog box for the user to input a number adjust image brightness. Calls AdjustBrightness of ShoppedGuiHelper and updates the Gui with the new image.

void UI::ShoppedGui::AdjustContrast (  )  [inline, private]

Pops up a dialog box for the user to input a number adjust image contrast. Calls AdjustContrast of ShoppedGuiHelper and updates the Gui with the new image.

EventArgs  e

EventArgs  e 
) [inline, private]

void UI::ShoppedGui::EnableGuiItems (  )  [inline]

Called upon once an image is loaded from file, this enables the features/options that can now be used.

void UI::ShoppedGui::Form1_Load ( object  sender,
EventArgs  e 
) [inline, private]

Initial loading of the Shopped program. Disables certain features/options that should not be available until an image is loaded into the program.

string UI::ShoppedGui::GetCoordinates (  )  [inline, private]

Gets the current coordinates of the mouse in the PictureBox and returns them as an ordered pair.

Returns:
A string representation of the coordinates as an ordered pair.
string UI::ShoppedGui::GetPixelColor (  )  [inline, private]

Takes the cursor's current position on the image and attempts to get the color of that pixel.

Returns:
The hexadecimal representation of the pixel's color.

void UI::ShoppedGui::SetAdditionalInfo (  )  [inline]

Sets the information about the PictureBox image that is located at the bottom of the Shopped GUI. Information includes height, width and the name of the image.

void UI::ShoppedGui::SetPictureBoxOnRedo (  )  [inline]

Given an Image object from the ImageHistory class, set the ShoppedGUI PictureBox (image being currently displayed) to that Image object.

void UI::ShoppedGui::SetPictureBoxOnUndo (  )  [inline]

Given an Image object from the ImageHistory class, set the ShoppedGUI PictureBox (image being currently displayed) to that Image object.

void UI::ShoppedGui::SetUndoAndRedo (  )  [inline, private]

Called upon when the event of clicking Undo/Redo in the Shopped GUI, this will enable or disable the Undo/Redo buttons and menu items in the GUI. This will also set the tooltip text for the undo/redo GUI items.

Sets the PictureBox to the image passed to this method.

Pops up a dialog box for the user to input a number to zoom the picture. Calls ZoomImage of ShoppedGuiHelper and updates the Gui with the new image.
